ourStory.title: OUR STORY
ourStory.subtitle: Get to know our story
ourStory.description:
Founded on November 2, 2023, Bloodhunts Gaming is an eSports organization that has been standing out in the competitive gaming scene, gaining increasing visibility in the gaming universe. Our commitment is to create an inclusive community that values both competitive play and active interaction with its followers, offering a welcoming and collaborative environment for all players.

Bloodhunts Gaming was born with the mission of being a meeting point to share strategies, experiences, and, above all, the passion for the gaming world. We are continuously open to new partnerships and new members who want to contribute to the growth of our organization, strengthening our position in the eSports scene.

With a long-term strategic vision, we are constantly seeking to expand our horizons and explore new growth opportunities. Bloodhunts Gaming is more than an organization; we are a solid community, committed to talent development and building valuable and lasting partnerships in the eSports market.
